name: Proto War
description:
This is a fast pace strategy game.

You have to keep control over your enemy and the territory.

Only if you manage to take all buildings, you will win.

Features:
- Fast-paced gameplay
- Increasing difficulty from map to map
- 5 Maps (more incoming)
- 6 Bulding types (more incoming)
- You can influence how the game will be developed / changed in future, by giving us feedback on our itch.io page

This is an early access version.

We are looking forward to complete the campaign and add a multiplayer mode.

If you like it, please support us with feedback or gold.
